context: Greetings Im well thanks how are you
Good! What kind of movies do you like?
I like all movies to be honest but my favorite is action and comedy. What about you?
I like action as well. What about Rush Hour (1998) ?
Good movie!! Have you seen Rampage (2018)
No I haven’t. Is it good?
or the new The Avengers (2012) or Deadpool 2 (2018) Yes very good lots of action
Have you seen Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
Thats what I just asked but yes I saw it
resp: I’ve seen Deadpool (2016) but not the second one
